summary:
I've come up with a few nice Imaginator presets while playing this amazing game. I may update or add presets in the future.
<br />
<br />So far I have made three presets:
<br />
<br />*Pure Realism - Gives the game a beautiful & naturally realistic look.
<br />
<br />*Dynam
descriptionHtml:
[center][center][font=Georgia][size=6]~Imaginator Presets~[/size]
[color=#ff00ff][size=4]#NEW# "Bleak Preset" Available NOW! 
[/size][/color][color=#ff00ff][size=3]v1.2[/size][/color]
[color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Suggested by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/29021280]Redbluesky21[/url] [/size]
[/color][/font][/center][/center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]I've come up with a few nice Imaginator presets while playing this amazing game. I may update or add presets in the future. So far I have made three presets:
[/size][/font]


[center][img]http://i119.photobucket.com/albums/o140/angelgran/a-purplebutterflydivider.gif[/img][/center]


[size=4]
[font=Georgia][color=#974806][b][size=5] *Pure Realism [/size][/b][/color][/font]- [font=Comic Sans MS]Gives the game a beautiful & naturally realistic look.[/font]
[/size]

[center][/center][size=5] [b][color=#ffc000][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif]*Dy[/font][font=Georgia]namic Warmth [/font][/color][/b][/size][size=4]- [font=Comic Sans MS]Gives the game an all-round cosier atmosphere.[/font]

[/size]
[color=#00b0f0][font=Georgia][size=5][b] *Totally Fresh [/b][/size][/font][/color][size=4]- [/size][size=4]Gives the game a chilly & refreshing look.
[/size]

[b][color=#666666][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3] #NEW# [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=5]*Bleak [/size][/font][/color][/b][size=4]- Makes the game look and feel gloomier. (Suggested by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/29021280]Redbluesky21[/url])[/size]


[size=4]                                                                  [/size]

                                                                                      #VIDEO NOT CURRENTLY WORKING#
                                                                                         That is why I just linked the URL
[size=4]                                                     [/size]
[size=3]                                            [/size][size=2] https://youtu.be/-Gqo43gEIJw?list=PLWMvEg2LxwXa1uMmZMmIl4mheoDRwvOY1[/size]
                                                                                        Video by Cal from DirtyWeaselMedia                                                                                                                                                                         (Go to - 14:41 to see a showcase of my presets)

                                                                                       
                                                                                      
                                           
[font=Comic Sans MS][center][img]http://i119.photobucket.com/albums/o140/angelgran/a-purplebutterflydivider.gif[/img][/center]
[/font]


[size=4]
[font=Comic Sans MS]All preset screenshots are displayed above and they are also included with a text file giving you the exact details for each preset. You can give me suggestions as to what could improve these presets. You can also suggest ideas for new presets. Just run it by me first and I will try to give you those presets! Feel free to upload your own screenshots with these presets applied and I will display my favourites in the images section! :)

[center]
[img]http://i119.photobucket.com/albums/o140/angelgran/a-purplebutterflydivider.gif[/img][/center]

I highly recommend using the following mods in combination with these Imaginator presets. They really help bring out the best of Imaginator's highly customisable visuals![/font][/size][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4] *^_^* [/size]

[size=2]Click on the '[b]#[/b]' |[/size]
                       |
                       |
                       V
                 
                        
[/font][size=4][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][font=Georgia][b][color=#ffff00]*Realistic Lighting Overhaul (RLO) [color=#f4f4f4][font=Georgia][size=4][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?]#
[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color][/color][/b][/font][/font][/size][size=4]
OR

[b][font=Georgia][color=#ffff00]*Enhanced Lights & Effects (ELFX)[/color] [font=Georgia][size=4][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]#[/url][/b][/size][/font][/font]
[/b]
[/size]

[size=4][b][color=#0070c0][font=Georgia]*Climates of Tamriel (CoT) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]#[/url][/font][/color][/b]

[/size]

[size=4][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000][b]*I Can't Believe It's Not ENB! (ICBINE) [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52718/?]2[/url]/[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63839/?]3[/url][/b][/b][/color][/font]

author: Zylice
